author: TravisEz13
body:
<!-- PR checklist -->
- [ ] Resolves issue #xyz.
- [x] Code is up-to-date with `master`.
- [ ] Add tests that fail without your changes.
- [x] Update all relevant [documentation](../docs).

<!-- Provide more details about the PR below -->

Clarified the Get PowerShell instructions, replacing the overcomplicated table.
Removed redundant contributing text and replaced with a link to contributing doc.
Removed maintainer specific text and replaced with link to contributor specific section for the topic
title: Fixes to readme
